storyInfo: The series of disturbances instigated by the Infected has left the Grand Knight Territory in turmoil. Finally getting her moment of reprieve, Nearl chances upon a Lazurite of the Armorless Union.

attributes.content: Guah... Uhhhâ€”
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: Aaah... ah...
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: Report. The Withered Knight is displaying rejection symptoms after the injection.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: No... We didn't observe similar reactions in the other knights. The pharmacists think it could be an allergic reaction that occurs in Sarkaz.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: What? T-That's a waste...
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: It's almost as concentrated as the restoration gels they sell in stores as it is... This stuff is for fixing armor, and they're human. If we keep injecting this into their bodies, we'll end up causing irreparable damage to their brains...
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Okay, I understand... They're Sarkaz... not human...
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: *Sigh*... You heard them. Increase the concentration by another 0.3%... We'll find out the Sarkaz limit.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: What... are you?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Gkhaa... Gkhaa...
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: You... Nightzmora... must die...
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: The young Nightzmora lets out a long sigh. He looks up to find the familiar night sky has been dispelled by the bright lights of the city.
Is this, too, a symbol of a civilization's advancement? Is Kazimierz conquering the night skies with its bright neon lights?
He finds himself struck with a sense of melancholy.
Hey!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Thank goodness... You're okay!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: U-Uh, Zofia? P-Please. Don't cry...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I'm glad you're alright, Maria.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: How were we supposed to face Old Nearl if something happened to you?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Not that we can face him the way things are now.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Ahaha... You're not that old. What are you talking about? *cough*.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Uhh... Zofia? Could you let go... Please?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Sorry to interrupt this exemplary show of sisterly love... but it seems Margaret is missing?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Uh... When did you...?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I've been here since the hugging.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Ugh... Who are you again?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Oh, this guy helped me out just nowâ€”
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: It's you! Y-You're...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: A case of mistaken identity, Old Knight.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: So? Where's Margaret?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: After all that ruckus, is the insensitive Radiant Knight still going to carry on with the Major, foolhardy as she is?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I... I don't know if we should tell her...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: The Armorless Union isn't going to give up so easily. They'll attack again sooner or later. You're all in danger!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But... telling Margaret is exactly what they want us to do...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: This is the Grand Knight Territory. There is nowhere to run. They'll always find you.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: These are different times, not like before. The General Chamber of Commerce is growing even as we speak.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: This is for your own safety, Maria. We have to tell Margaret.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Is that really going to solve anything?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Are they really going to give up just because she pulls out of the Major?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.text: Do the knights clinging to life in this city have no way out left?

attributes.content: (W-What am I thinking...?)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: It's not a bad thing to be so lost in thought. So long as you're not like a certain someone, anyway.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Okay, if Margaret isn't here, I still have something else to attend to. Cheerio.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Hold on, what are youâ€”
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Zofia.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Let him go. Don't ask any more. It's okay.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Alright then...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I owe you for saving Maria though. If there's anything we can do to help... let us know.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hm... Right. Your attack glanced to the side, Maria. Your balance was off, and you were a little too slow too.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Seems like this is an emotional problem, though, and I can't pretend I know how girls work.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Is it an emotional problem?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Knights don't fight on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You won't be getting very far on borrowed ideals alone.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Confessarius. Seriously? Just the name gives me chills.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: If you're going to question that, try Darksteel.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I'll pass... He's a Sarkaz too, isn't he? Something like a legendary mercenary?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: A Sarkaz from Kazdel, the Radiant Knight, and this Rhodes Island... Interesting.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Interesting, and also in the way.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: We have to deal with both the Board and the Knights Association, we have to take care of the Infected so discreetly, and we even have to be careful and cautious about it. When will all this be over?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Soon...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Right... soon.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: But Darksteel doesn't step up. Doesn't that mean we'll have to take care of all this dirty work ourselves?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Let's show some mercy. Why not?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: They lost. I have the right to do whatever I want with them.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: They are my kin, and I can't bear to see my kin end up like this in Kazimierz. Let me take care of them.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Your kin... heh.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: These filthy creatures don't deserve to be my war prize.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I'll break one arm each for their punishment. Take them away, the eyesores.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Ah, that's it? I thought we'd have to fight to come to an agreement.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Eh, hey now. Keep your blade where it is. Forget I said anything.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Reigning victorious over the Candle Knight, the Radiant Knight is making huge waves in both in the media and on the intercity net.
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: Furthermore, citizens are trembling in fear with Infected terrorism on the rise across the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: Area 0's officer-in-charge and a General Chamber of Commerce spokesman have announced they will hold a press conference in the upcoming days.
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: Anyway... That's about the size of it, Doctor, Miss Amiya.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'm afraid... things aren't very calm in Area 0 these days, and the Infected are taking the fall for the uprisings that happened the other day.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: These are extraordinary circumstances... but we don't want to put a stop to the sheltering and medical treatment just because of this.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Please avoid wandering around town the next couple days. I'm very sorry.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Doctor... the news...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's not 100% false, unfortunately.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: The Infected have actually been making a lot of noise, especially after the Radiant Knight defeated the Candle Knight.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: We had eleven cases of violence just yesterday.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Gossip is a fearful thing, and the media knows that best.;......;That can't be true.

attributes.content: Apparently some of the Board members were assaulted?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Whoa... There are even protests going on.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I just hope it won't affect the knights... That lady yesterday said she'd buy toys for her siblings with her winnings.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Then... does that mean Nearl is...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Deport the Infected! The Infected don't belong in the Grand Knight Territory!
attributes.name: Protestors

attributes.content: The Infected quarantine zone is an Oripathy petri dish!
attributes.name: Protestors

attributes.content: What's going on here? I just got out of my meeting. How did things get so out of hand?
attributes.name: A Commuting Worker

attributes.content: Hm? Look at that city block over there. Isn't that the Infected shelter and treatment center?
attributes.name: A Hurrying Worker

attributes.content: The protest's let up a little already. It was way worse this afternoon. They had a huge banner, too.
attributes.name: A Hurrying Worker

attributes.content: Do you need something?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight... Do you know why those Infected dare do this out in the open?
attributes.name: A Protesting Knight

attributes.content: They're committing terrorist attacks all over the city, dragging innocent citizens into the fray. Do you know where they got the courage to do this?
attributes.name: A Protesting Knight

attributes.content: It was you! It was you and the Blood Knight. It was you infected knights who gave them the right the resist!
attributes.name: A Protesting Knight

attributes.content: I... I know you're no villain, champion. I even used to be a fan of yours.
attributes.name: A Protesting Knight

attributes.content: But by staying in the Major, you are only giving the Infected false hope.
attributes.name: A Protesting Knight

attributes.content: False hope that... they can change the status quo.
attributes.name: A Protesting Knight

attributes.content: You'd do well to keep your nose clean, Radiant Knight... Don't end up regretting your actions.
attributes.name: A Protesting Knight

attributes.content: What's the matter, Nearl?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You don't look like a knight who just won a match.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Nearl.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: If there's something on your mind, tell us.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Right... I'm just thinking about the Infected.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: About that... we have another lead. Amiya knows already. There's no doubt that someone is behind all this.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: But you don't need to worry about that right now.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Trust me, and trust Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Keep your light shining bright, and worry about nothing else, Nearl.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: At the same time... Please don't push yourself either. You're strong, but your exhaustion is building up.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Try to take it easier once in a while.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Kazimierz... is my home.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'm very happy to see Maria all grown up and aiming to become a knight, and that Zofia and Old Marcin are both doing well...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But, right this moment, I feel more relieved that you two are here by my side.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Are we your family too, Nearl?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: It's hard to say, Liz.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It'll be some time before winter comes, but it still gets pretty chilly at night here in Kazimierz. Liz, go back to Amiya.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: We've all been worried about you ever since you 'left' Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I know, but that's exactly why I can't drag them into my own mess.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But you're fine dragging us into it?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You're free to leave now, if you want.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Well, well, look at you. Our Radiant Knight acting all snarky.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Music...? Is there a bar nearby?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It used to be a row of regular old offices here. If I remember correctly, there was a publisher.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Grand Knight Territory wasn't this big...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But, for the past couple decades, every time there was a Major, the Grand Knight Territory would pick out three cities to dock with after a round of competitive bidding.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Kawalerielki Alliance.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The city's changing... and even though this is my home, it feels a little... foreign.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You haven't been back for very long yet, Nearl.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: And you dove straight into the Kazimierz Major right away... you chose to throw yourself into your ideals.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You haven't started living a new, proper life here just yet.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I will, sooner or later. But now's not the time.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You must be tired... I can feel it.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Should we take a walk? The night breeze might sweep away some of your exhaustion.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Sure. Take my hand.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: How tough was the Candle Knight?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I was surprised to find a knight like her in Kazimierz these days.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: She's strong, but her hesitation proved to be her weakness. It's too bad we couldn't face each other when she's at her best.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Did you enjoy it?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I used to despise knight sports. No... even now, I feel nothing but sorrow for the shape Kazimierz is in.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But... haven't we been through a lot together?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The three friends walk slowly down the street under the Kazimierz night sky.
Far away from the loud markets and hustle and bustle, only traces of the city's warmth can be felt in this alley.
The warmth comes from liquor and song, as well as the aroma of baked goods that yet lingers as pedestrians come and go.
This doesn't change what we need to do.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: And that's even if, after everything has come to pass, my journey is destined to be ridiculed.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: â€”Like wings taking flight in the night breeze.
â€”Like a traveler with a heart full of dreams.
â€”The knight sets out on her journey.
â€”In search of true love.
What a beautiful voice...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Maybe it's a wandering singer.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Is there a place so romantic in Kazimierz too?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: It's proof that there are people who live here.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: â€”A fate as fragile as a cornflower.
â€”To face a test fierce as windstorms.
Hmm... Hmhmm...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Liz, would you care to dance?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Huh? Me? What...?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: It's fine. Take my hand.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Oh... S-Slow down, Nearl...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The blue bird takes flight in the gentle night sky.
It dances amongst the glowing neon towers and navigates through a gently flowing river of time.
Taking the Sarkaz's hand, the knight waltzes back and forth under the dim lamplights.
The sight is reminiscent of the noblest statues found in Laterano.
You're beautiful, Liz.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: R-Really?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Perhaps you will actually be able to dance one day.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: When that day comes... will you be there by our side?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The knight stops and kneels down before the lady of the lamp.
I promise, Liz.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Mhm...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: We'll be waiting, Nearl.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: At the end of your journey, before your light burns out, we'll be there with you.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: When the time comes, ifâ€”
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Nearl.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Good evening, Radiant Knight... and the lovely Sarkaz ladies.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I'm absolutely delighted to see you again so soon.
attributes.name: Roy
